metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11387 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) through 3.1.0. /rules/REQUEST-942-APPLICATION-ATTACK-SQLI.conf allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (ReDOS) by entering a specially crafted string with nested repetition operators.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-1').
